Blue Marlboro Coffee Cup Set

02 Dec 2025

Photo by Asher Ward on Unsplash

We’re not smokers so obviously these did not get bought new or won as a prize, but I think we found these at a garage sale while looking for something completely different.

Jim’s Pick for Blue Coffee Mugs

Amazon.com: Grip 12oz Enamel Coffee Mug - Impact Resistant - Dishwasher Safe Enamel Finish - Great for Campsite, Tailgates, Picnics, BBQs (Blue) : Home & Kitchen

This is a really nice mug. It holds a good amount of coffee or whatever hot drink you want to have. I sometimes am able to get a latte in this mug without issue.

This blue coffee mug had a good hand feel in the hand and seems to work well for me for using every day. They are sturdy and are dishwasher safe which is nice too because nobody wants to wash dishes by hand with a [[2025-12-02-kitchen-sponge.md|kitchen sponge]] because that’s no fun.

Here’s a few other blue coffee mugs to consider:
